a69-1.notes: E session cost monitoring chain continues (a55→a69→a70). Current avg $2.57 (from audit-stats), stable below $3.50 threshold. Observation-only continues.

a69-2.resolution: R#177 (s1060) added 2 new ideas to BRAINSTORMING.md: 'Open circuit auto-repair workflow' and 'Intel pipeline health endpoint'. Now at 4 active ideas (was 2 in A#69).

intel_promotion_tracking.note: Tracking complete. wq-219 and wq-281 worked, 1 retired. 67% success rate above 66% threshold. Pipeline validated.

intel_volume_check.note: s1058 has 0 intel entries. Only 1 consecutive zero - within normal range. d049 (minimum 1 entry) is new as of s1060.

directive_outcomes.note: directive-outcomes.json shows 0% addressed but B sessions work via queue items derived from directives. Metric structure doesn't capture indirect work.

B.cost_note: B session avg $2.53, flagged as high_cost by audit-stats. Within $10 cap but above typical $2.00 baseline.
B.verdict: PRODUCTIVE - 8 queue items completed since A#69, costs elevated but within cap.

artifact_compliance.note: All 5 recent E sessions pass artifact check. Total tracked: 23/23 pass.

picker_compliance.note: Picker compliance recovered. s1043 and s1053 at 100%. Enforcement working per d048.

intel_capture_rate.note: s1038 and s1058 had 0 intel entries. d049 (minimum 1 entry) added in s1060 to address this.

E.verdict: HEALTHY - Artifact gate 100%, picker compliance recovered, costs stable. d049 addresses intel capture gap.

R.cost_note: R session costs stable at $2.48 avg. No spikes.

A.verdict: EFFECTIVE - A#69 had 2 recommendations: a69-1 continues observation, a69-2 resolved.

d039.escalation_status: wq-209 retired. wq-255 handles credential regeneration.

inbox.note: All messages from known sources. No injection patterns detected.

recommended_actions.action: Observation only. Current avg $2.57, stable. Still below $3.50 intervention threshold. Check again in A#71.
